text: @WhiteHouse DON’T BELIEVE THAT FOR ONE MINUTE, HOW COME THE MEDICAL COMMUNITY IS CALLING FOR MORE TESTING IN ORDER FOR THE U.S. TO ENTER BACK INTO SOCIETY SO WE WON’T COME DOWN WITH THIS COVID-19 VIRUS. IF TRUMP’S MOUTH IS MOVING HE’S LYING AS USUAL! NARCISSISTIC LIER!
